definition: horse's tail/pointed posterior section of a locust etc
tail/remainder/remnant/extremity/sixth of the 28 constellations/classifier for fish

sentences.english: Koalas live in trees and eat leaves.
sentences.chinese: 無尾熊住在樹上和喫樹葉。

sentences.english: She has not seen a koala .
Koalas spend most of their lives in trees.
sentences.chinese: 無尾熊幾乎一輩子都待在樹上。

sentences.english: My friends like koalas very much because they are very cute.
sentences.chinese: 我的朋友們喜歡無尾熊，因爲它們非常可愛。

sentences.english: I think koala is the cutest animal in this zoo.
sentences.chinese: 我覺得無尾熊是這個動物園裏最可愛的動物。

sentences.english: Why are koalas among the most beloved of all animals?
sentences.chinese: 爲何無尾熊會在最受喜愛的動物名單中呢？

sentences.english: Indeed, everything about the koala seems slow.
sentences.chinese: 的確，無尾熊的一切似乎都很慢。

sentences.english: The pool is full of cool koalas and poor pandas.
sentences.chinese: 池子了滿滿的都是冷靜的無尾熊和可憐的貓熊。

sentences.english: And because koalas are exotic animals, their prices are fairly expensive.
sentences.chinese: 而且無尾熊屬外來種，價格應當不便宜。

sentences.english: Koalas are very fussy eaters, feeding almost exclusively on the leaves of a few species of eucalypt.
sentences.chinese: 無尾熊是很挑剔，幾乎只在樹葉的幾種桉樹。

definition: Cebu, a province (and a city) in the Philippines (Tw)
to eat one's fill/to be full
